alert.note: Alert for Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:05PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino County from Parks to Bellemont along I-40 through 345 PM MST... At 303 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Parks, or 17 miles west of Flagstaff, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Localized flooding is possible. Hazardous road conditions along I-40 expected due to heavy rainfall with reduced visibility. Locations impacted include... Parks and Bellemont. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 171 and 190. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
